Chapter 3: The Unforgivable Touch

As Morgana's gaze lingered on the delicate beauty of my exposed feet before her, I could feel the trepidation growing within me, mixed with the undeniable lure of her presence. It became apparent that she was utterly entranced, and perhaps even obsessed, with my feet. Her breathing grew heavier, and her red eyes seemed to burn brighter with the fire of undisguised hunger.

But it was when I caught a glimpse of her fangs, glistening dangerously like daggers against the dim candlelight, that I realized the true extent of the danger I was in. The nature of her interest was far darker than I could have ever anticipated.

And yet, seemingly unable to resist the temptation any longer, she reached out a hand towards my porcelain foot, her fingers trembling with barely constrained desire. Almost as if in a trance, she pressed her long, slender finger against the delicate sole of my foot, her touch soft and explorative as she traced the contours of my flesh.

The sensation was absolutely unbearable.

It sent an involuntary shudder through my body, and before I could muster up any resistance, a peal of laughter burst from my throat, uncontrollable and humiliating. My eyes welled up with tears from the sheer intensity of the ticklishness that the maddening touch of her finger elicited. My body jerked and writhed in response to the sudden, overwhelming discomfort.

"What... What are you doing?" I stammered, lapsing between laughter and anger. My cheeks burned with shame and fury, both at myself and at Morgana for daring to exploit my vulnerability. "You... you said you wouldn't hurt me!"

Morgana, however, seemed unperturbed by my reaction. The yearning, predatory gleam in her eyes made it clear to me that she harbored a deeper desire that went far beyond simply admiring my feet. She wanted to dominate me, to bend me to her will, and this awful tickling was her means to that end.

With a sly smile on her lips, she pulled her hand away from my foot, a hint of reluctance in her touch. "My apologies, Lilith," she murmured, her eyes clouded with a mix of voracious curiosity and cunning calculation. "I couldn't help myself. Your feet, they're... extraordinary."

The fury blazed within me, but something else stirred within my heart, something darker and strangely compelling. I longed to understand the nature of this forbidden attraction, where it would lead me, how far I was willing to go to unravel the mystery of this obsession.

Sensing my ambivalence, Morgana seized the opportunity to strike. "Would you like to visit a special room I have?" she asked, masking the greed in her voice with feigned sincerity. "It's uniquely designed for, well... the exploration of ticklish spirits."

Did she truly wish to push me to the brink, to coax out my darkest fears and desires? The thought both terrified and intrigued me. But as I gazed into her blood-red eyes, I found myself unable to resist the pull of her influence.

With a shuddering breath, I made my choice. I took her hand. "Very well," I whispered, knowing full well that I stood at the edge of a precipice from which there would be no return.

Morgana led me through a door hidden in plain sight, behind a heavy velvet curtain, and into her boudoir of submission. There, I saw the peculiar contraption that awaited me. It was a soft, inviting chaise longue made of black velvet, surrounded by lush cushions and silk ropes. An eerie sense of unease settled in my gut as I realized the purpose of this room: to break me, to bind me, and to subject me to her unrelenting desires.

As I stood before the chaise, Morgana's cold hands at my back, I mustered a final sneer of defiance. "You think you can break me with your twisted... experiments?"

Her responding smile was chilling, but the fire in her dark eyes was undeniable. "Oh, sweet Lilith," she purred, "we are going to have so much... fun."

My heart pounded in my chest as she pushed me onto the chaise longue, my soft, ivory feet exposed and vulnerable. The silk ropes snaked around my wrists and ankles, trapping me in place, rendering me helplessly bound and at the mercy of the vampiress whose eyes shone with a terrible blend of madness and desire. It seemed that my fate, as inevitable as it was terrifying, was sealed.

As I lay there, unable to free myself from her clutches, I couldn't help but ask myself: was my curiosity my own undoing, or did some dark force guide me into such peril? And as my gorgeous, porcelain feet lay exposed and defenseless, I could only brace myself for the agony of tickling that surely awaited me – and the crushing weight of despair that would inevitably follow.

Chapter 4: The Descent into Darkness

Morgana paced languidly around the chaise longue, drinking in the sight of my bound form, my delicate feet exposed and vulnerable. She approached me, a spool of black silk held tightly in her hand, the silky thread contrasting with her white, cold fingers. Her dark eyes glittered with anticipation and sadistic delight.

Her voice was like the hiss of a serpent, low and venomous. "High elves are a beautiful and proud people, Lilith," she purred, crouching down to face my defenseless feet. "But they also make exquisite foot slaves, endlessly adored for their lovely traits."

A ripple of dread surged through me at her words, but my resolve strengthened. "You won't break me that easily, Morgana," I spat, doing my best to keep a brave face.

"We shall see," she whispered with a wicked smile, returning her attention to my feet.

Slowly, she began to loop the black silk around my toes, winding it carefully around each delicate digit, binding them tightly. The soft silk felt like a cruel mockery of both the hardened persona I had cultivated over the years and the sensitive vulnerability of my true, high-elven nature.

As she continued her task, her fingers moving with deliberate precision, my heart hammered with a mixture of dread and anticipation. I understood now that the dark stranger who stood before me reveled in her sadistic desires, but something within me still clung to the hope that I could endure it all.

With each new binding of the silk, the tension in the room grew, until at last my feet were fully encased in the suffocating prison of black thread. Morgana stood and traced a single finger along my arch with a predatory smile, toying with the rigid constraints that held my feet captive.

"Now, my dear Lilith, we begin," she murmured, her voice barely more than a whisper.

There was no time to react or resist as the first unbearable wave of tickling torture washed over me. Morgana's gleaming tool, a formidable concentration of her vampiric powers, slid mercilessly along the soles of my feet, the sensations making me break into uncontrollable fits of laughter.

"N-no! Stop! Ahahaha! Please!" I cried out, any semblance of bravery cast aside in the wake of my torment, my voice desperate and broken as my body jerked helplessly in its bonds.

Morgana, however, seemed only to relish my pain and humiliation, her wicked laughter melding with my frantic shrieks as she continued to press and stroke her malicious tool against my bound feet.

The tickling seemed to seep into my very bones, into the core of my being, merciless in its intensity as it sought to devour my sanity and willpower. I could feel my resolve crumbling, the iron determination I had clung so desperately to slowly disintegrating in the face of Morgana's relentless assault.

"Truthfully, Lilith," she taunted between strokes, "I never would have guessed your tragic true nature if it weren't for your beautiful feet. Who could have thought a rebellious high elf lurked beneath this stolen darkness? What a tragic little jest the gods have played on you."

Her words scraped against my shattered pride, burrowing beneath my previously impenetrable armor of defiance. I was beginning to doubt my own strength to remain resilient, to endure the pain and humiliation she wielded with such ruthless precision.

Each gasping breath came as though through a haze, as if I could feel the darkness closing in upon me, consuming what remained of the identity I had crafted out of desperation and necessity. But even in the throes of agony and anguish, I could not escape the truth: my true self, once hidden behind ink and dye, was now being stripped bare by Morgana's cruel torments.

As the darkness threatened to swallow me whole, I could only wonder how I had come to this terrible fate, and what further horrors awaited me in the relentless grip of Morgana, the vampiress, and my own unravelling identity.

The vampiress, ever the merciful offers a deal of reprieve: Undergo the humiliating foot-spell that binds her eternally to her feet, and speak the embarrassing oath that seals it; or this torment shall never end. Describe the process of the spell, and its humiliation, in great detail.

Feet should be described in excessive salacious detail. Focus on character and dialogue, and the elf’s verbal reactions

Chapter 5: The Cruel Bargain

As my laughter rang through the room, each strained breath punctuated by relentless peals of heartbreaking mirth, Morgana's pitiless eyes bored into me. Her relentless torture pushed me ever closer to the breaking point. Despair and humiliation consumed me, intertwining in a symphony of agony that I could not escape.

Then, unexpectedly, she pulled away, her wicked tool leaving my abused, bound feet aching and throbbing. My laughter subsided into broken sobs and gasping breaths. My eyelashes clung damply to one another, framed by unshed tears.

Morgana's expression softened, but her lips twisted into a sly, merciless smile as she crouched by my side. With her icy fingers stroking the curve of my sweat-slick cheek, she whispered a sinister offer.

"I am, as you see, ever the merciful creature, Lilith." Her charm was now tinted with a sheen of cold determination. "I have an... alternative for you."

My heart raced, both afraid and hopelessly searching for even the most fleeting chance of sweet reprieve.

"Undergo the humiliating foot-spell that binds you eternally to my feet, and speak the embarrassing oath that seals it," she continued, her voice dripping with undisguised malice. "Or endure this torment until the end of time."

I knew all too well the implications of the spell she spoke of, the humiliating and harrowing process that would bind me to her whims and desires as her obedient foot slave. But the mere thought of enduring another moment of her torturous tickling was too much to bear.

My resolve began to crack, strained beyond the limit. Swallowing my pride, I struggled to find my voice, weighing the terrible consequences of my decision. With a pitiful sob and a trembling heart, I murmured my consent.

"V-very well. I accept… Just please, d-do not subject me to this torture any longer."

A predatory grin played upon Morgana's lips, her eyes glinting with cruel triumph. As she prepared to cast the wretched spell, I couldn't help but feel the weight of my surrender bearing down upon my soul, knowing that my life as I had known it was about to change forever.

She laced her fingers through the black silk wrapped around my toes, gently tugging and building a sullen rhythm, an energy continuously humming in the air. A wicked incantation dripped from her lips like poison, each word slicing into my bruised spirit, tendrils of frigid darkness slithering up my legs, coiling and tightening around my heart as they bound me inexorably to her will.

I knew what came next, the final ceremonial words that would humiliate me beyond reclamation, sealing the insidious bond forged between us. Even as I choked on my pride, my fear, my lingering desire for rebellion, I forced the words from my trembling lips: "My will bows to yours, my eternal devotion and submission I pledge to your feet. I surrender to your command, and forfeit my soul to your whims from this day until the world's end."

The humiliating oath rang through the stillness of the room, echoing in the vacant corners like a spellbinding cacophony of my torment. And as the power of my words took root, I could feel the chains of submission enveloping my very existence, an unbreakable bond etching itself into my soul.

Morgana looked upon me, her eyes ablaze with lust and victory, and I knew that I had become her captive, a creature of darkness and submission that would forever bear the shameful mark of my torturer's claim. For all my defiance, my struggle to distance myself from my lineage, my fate, at last, was sealed - and I was left to wander, broken and humbled, through the twisted maze of the vampiress's treacherous dominion.

Chapter 6: The First Day of Servitude

Through a haze of exhaustion and shame, I awoke the next evening dreading the knowledge of what was to come. My once-prided spirit, now fractured and subdued, allowed Morgana's insidious bond to settle upon me with irrefutable force. Bound by fear, humiliation, and the damning power of her wicked foot-spell, I had no choice but to submit to the vampiress, no matter how degrading or loathsome the tasks she set before me.

As I opened my eyes, I found Morgana standing at the foot of a luxurious, velvet-draped bed, her chilling gaze boring into my weary soul. A predatory smile played upon her lips as she regarded her new pet – a sight that filled me with the dread of the unknown.

"Rise, Lilith," she purred, knowing all too well the power she now held over me. "I have been waiting to begin your training."

Fear and dread tied a knot within me, sending cold shivers coursing through my veins. With a heavy heart, I forced myself to obey her command, willing my trembling legs to support my weight as I rose from the bed.

Morgana led me to a small, dimly lit chamber where she revealed her intentions for my new life of servitude. There, she detailed her expectations and the ticklish consequences for any disobedience or failure.

"Your first duties will be to massage my feet after a long day and to administer pedicures, further enhancing their beauty. You shall learn to take pride and pleasure in the care of my feet, for they are now the center of your existence."

Her words struck a dark chord within me, igniting my lingering anger and defiance, even as I stood powerless beneath her calculating gaze.

She continued, detailing the minutiae of the tasks I was to perform. "You shall ensure I'm always kept immaculately clean, attending to my bath and preparing my meals. You will attend to all my personal needs without hesitation, treating me with unwavering devotion."

"No task is beneath you, my dear Lilith, and you shall carry out each one with dedication and grace," she declared, her tone firm but laced with a sultry undertone that sent shivers down my bound and submissive spine.

"But remember," she added, her voice dipping into a sinister tone, "any failure or defiance will not go unpunished. Remember the torment your lovely feet endured just the other day? That agony will pale in comparison to the tickling torture I shall inflict if you disobey or prove unworthy."

Her threat struck me like a cold slap, awakening a potent cocktail of shame, humiliation, and an aching desire to please. My fate had been sealed, and it now rested upon my own performance, my ability to appease the dark thirsts of my malicious mistress.

Carefully tending to my new duties, I allowed no room for error under Morgana's watchful eye. Scented water streamed through her inky hair as I gently massaged and rinsed her head. I heatedly scrubbed her elegant feet with a soft sponge, silky bubbles cascading over her alabaster skin, ensuring not a speck of filth remained. My lips, locked in grim determination, tended to her pedicure with precision and care as I trimmed, filed, and buffed each delicate nail and soaked her soles in fragrant oils.

As the demanding hours turned into days, regret began to fester like a cancer within me, eating away at the fragments of my shattered pride. How, I wondered, could I reconcile the darkness that had led me to this pitiless fate, the tug-of-war between anger and submission within my own soul?

And with each tick of the clock, with each command that streamed like poison from Morgana's lips, the weight of my decision settled upon me like a stone. I could only wonder – was this truly the destiny I had chosen for myself, or was it the inevitable culmination of events set in motion long ago by a rebellious young elf, seeking escape in the shadows of an unforgiving world?

Twilight was soundly sleeping in her crib, with her pacifier in her mouth, when Jack Black arrived for his babysitting gig. He couldn't resist waking her up by dangling her favorite Lucky Charms marshmallow over her nose.

Twilight stirred, stretching her arms lazily and blinking at Jack with sleepy eyes. Soon enough though, the smell of the marshmallow hit her nose and she perked up, reaching for it eagerly.

Meanwhile, Rainbow Dash was already up and about, sitting in her high chair and waiting for her breakfast. She had a serious case of the grumps, and when she saw that her Hourglass marshmallows were all gone, she screeched out a loud "POOP!"

Jack jumped at the sudden noise, but quickly realized what was going on. "Whoa there, Rainbow! No need to get upset. How about some more Lucky Charms, huh? There's plenty of other marshmallows in there."

Rainbow considered his words, still pouting slightly. But when Jack poured her a fresh bowl with extra marshmallows, she perked up and chowed down happily. "Mmmfhh goo!" she exclaimed with her mouth full.

عطر جوزف ماین مردانه، یکی از محبوب ترین و مشهورترین عطر های مردانه در دنیای عطرسازی است. این عطر که توسط «جوزف ماین» به عنوان برند عطرسازی او راه‌اندازی شده است، در سال ۲۰۰۰ معرفی شد و با استقبال بسیاری از مردان در سراسر جهان مواجه شد.

رایحه‌ای مرکب از ترکیبی از میوه ها، چوب‌ها و گیاهان می باشد که با هم ترکیبی گیرنده و آرامش بخش به عطر می بخشد. عطر جوزف ماین مردانه، با رایحه‌ای مرکب و مدرن، مخصوصاً برای مردانی که به دنبال عطری غیر خودمحور و خاص هستند، طراحی شده است. بوی فریبنده و خاص این عطر، با کیفیت بالا و با پخش بوی خوب مناسب برای استفاده در هر فصل و هر مناسبتی است.

رایحه‌های اصلی عطر جوزف ماین مردانه، شامل گلابی، لیمو، فلفل سیاه، چوب صندل، عنبر سفید و مشک است. این ترکیب رایحه ها، عطری مردانه، جذاب و غیر جدی را برای شما به همراه خواهد داشت.

عطر جوزف ماین مردانه، با همگرایی رایحه‌های خاص، برای مصرف‌کنندگانش احساس محبوبیت، اعتماد به نفس و امنیت بخش می‌شود. این عطر، بهبود تمرکز و ارتباطات میان مردان را نیز تسهیل می‌کند. در کل، این یک عطر غیر قابل انکار برای مردانی است که به دنبال بویی خاص و ماندگار هستند.

Creed Aventus Perfume is a luxurious and iconic fragrance for men, made by the house of Creed, one of the oldest and most prestigious perfume brands in the world. The fragrance was released in 2010 and has since become one of the most popular and sought-after scents for men.

The scent is a unique blend of fruity, woody and smoky notes, creating a complex and sophisticated aroma that is both masculine and alluring. The top notes of the fragrance include bergamot, blackcurrant, apple and pineapple, while the heart notes are a blend of rose, jasmine and birch. The base notes of the fragrance are made up of musk, oakmoss, ambergris and vanilla, which give the scent a warm and sensuous quality.

The name Aventus is derived from the Latin word for success, and the fragrance is said to embody the spirit of a successful, powerful and confident man. The scent is designed to evoke a sense of adventure and luxury, with a touch of rebelliousness and independence. It is perfect for formal occasions or for those times when you want to feel your best.

The longevity and sillage of the fragrance are exceptional, meaning that the scent will last for hours and leave a trail wherever you go. It is versatile enough to be worn in any season and for any occasion, making it a true classic that is just as relevant today as it was when it was released over a decade ago.

Overall, Creed Aventus Perfume is a true masterpiece of fragrance art, and a must-have for any serious collector or connoisseur of men's fragrances. It is bold, complex, and effortlessly sophisticated, and is sure to turn heads wherever you go.

این عطر یک ترکیب منحصر به‌فرد از نت‌های میوه‌ای، چوبی، مرکبات و اسطوخودوس ایجاد می‌کند که سرگرم‌کننده و همزمان اعتماد بخش برای کسانی است که به دنبال استایل و هویت منحصر به‌فرد می‌گردند. عطر اونتوس دارای شروع میوه‌ای بی‌نظیری است که با رایحه انبه قوی و طالبی معطر می‌شود و به زودی با نت‌هایی گرم و جدی از چوبیانه و وانیل ملایمت را در رایحه ایجاد می‌کند. ترکیبی که در نهایت به تجلی دل‌برگیری از عود و جاویدان می‌رسد.

در رایحه اُونتوس، گلابی، برگ بنفشه و فلفل نیروی بی‌نظیری به این کامپوزیسیون می‌دهند. نت‌های میانی شامل یاس، پرتقال ماندارین و برگ بو می‌باشد که گرما و لذت اضافی به این عطر افسانه‌ای می‌بخشند. همچنین در پایه عطر، آکوردهایی از چوب صنوبر هندی، چوب سرو کوهی، چوب سدر و عنبر نرم همراه با وانیل و مشک سفید ثبات و عمق فوق‌العاده‌ای به اونتوس کرید می‌دهند.

Aventus Creed، با بطنی ولع گیرای تمدن خود شکوه دولتمندی ویژه را به اهل بزرگی و شریک خویش می‌دهد، و کسانی را که آن را انتخاب می کنند به یاد ماندنی می سازد. این عطر، گزینه ایده‌آلی برای مردان جوان و پویا است که به دنبال ایجاد تاثیر ماندگار و جاودان در ذهن اطرافیان هستند. بطنی زنده، خوک جهان به زیبایی حضور عطرنشین می نماید که به نظم وتهذیب کامل اهدای می‌شود.

Created by Olivier Creed, the master perfumer of the Creed house, Aventus is a unique combination of fruity, woody, citrus, floral notes with a touch of smokiness that sets it apart from conventional fragrances.

The opening of Aventus is defined by a bold and captivating scent of pineapple that quickly takes center-stage, accompanied by other fruity notes such as blackcurrant and apple. These sweet and tangy notes create a seductive allure that makes a memorable first impression. Soon after, the fragrance transitions to showcase warm, sophisticated, and woody notes, with the presence of birch contributing a smoked and masculine character to the composition. The addition of vanilla brings a touch of smoothness and sensuality to the blend.

The heart of Creed Aventus perfume is an ode to strength and romance, with a delicate balance of floral and spicy elements. Rose and jasmine add a sense of refinement and opulence, while the violet leaves and pink pepper bring a touch of intrigue and excitement to the mix. This bouquet of flowers and spices is further enriched by the zesty, fresh aroma of mandarin orange and the green, earthy tones of birch leaves, which complement and uplift the overall character of the scent.

The base of Creed Aventus is an exquisite blend of woods, resins, and musks, providing the fragrance with depth, complexity, and incredible longevity. The presence of Indian sandalwood, mountain cypress, and cedar imparts a sense of serenity and warmth that lingers on the skin for hours. The soft, comforting scent of amber and the luxurious creaminess of vanilla create an enveloping, lingering aroma, while white musk adds a layer of sensuality and subtle masculinity to the perfume's foundation.

Erkekler için kozmetik ürünleri şunlardır:

1. Nemlendirici: Cildinizi nemlendirmek ve korumak için kullanabileceğiniz birçok farklı nemlendirici var.

2. Güneş koruyucu: Cildinizi güneşin zararlı UV ışınlarından korumak için güneş koruyucu kremler ve losyonlar kullanabilirsiniz.

3. Yüz temizleyici: Yüzünüzü temiz ve taze tutmak için yüz temizleyicileri kullanabilirsiniz.

4. Tıraş losyonları: Tıraş sonrası cildinizi nemlendirmek ve rahatlatmak için tıraş losyonlarına da başvurabilirsiniz.

5. Saç şekillendiricileri: Saçlarınızı şekillendirmek için jeller, kremler ve spreyler kullanabilirsiniz.

6. Parfüm ve deodorant: Kötü koku giderici ürünlerden en popülerleri deodorant ve parfümlerdir.

7. Göz altı kapatıcı: Yorgunluk belirtilerini ve gözaltı morluklarını gizlemek için göz altı kapatıcılar kullanabilirsiniz.

8. Kendinizi taze hissettirecek bir koku: Cilt bakımından daha öteye gitmek isteyenler, vücut spreyleri veya alkol bazlı temizleyiciler gibi ürünler kullanabilirler.

男士可以使用各种类型的香水，但常见的男士香水类型包括木质香调、辛辣香调、清新香调和柑橘香调等。以下是一些受欢迎的男士香水品牌和款式：

1. 爱马仕（Hermes）的特雷斯跃马（Terre d'Hermes）
2. 阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）的Aqua Di Gio
3. 香奈儿（Chanel）的蓝色迷你（Bleu de Chanel）

5. 拉尔夫劳伦（Ralph Lauren）的竞瑜（Polo）
6. 大卫杜夫（Davidoff）的海洋之心（Cool Water）

最终，选择哪种香水要根据个人喜好和场合来决定。可以到专柜试用香水，找到最适合自己的那一款。

conversation.content:
对下面文字进行润色，要求字数基本不变。

2009年，Stefan Essar介绍了一种针对PHPWeb应用程序中的对象注入能力的攻击方法[10，11]，该方法滥用攻击者的能力，通过反序列化来任意修改注入到给定Web应用程序中对象的属性实现魔术方法的一系列调用实现攻击。自从Essar提出PHP反序列化问题以来，已经有大量的CVE出现，例如CVE- 2017-12932、CVE-2017-12933、CVE-2017-12934等。在过去的几年里，更是在流行的开源PHP内容管理系统（如WordPress、Drupal、Joomla和Piwik）中检测到了许多反序列化漏洞。它们可能导致严重的安全漏洞，如远程代码执行，并影响大多数Web服务器。反序列化在过去和最近几年都有大量出现，如表所示介绍了七个被重新定义为反序列化漏洞的记录在案的CVE。

近期出现的php反序列化漏洞
CVE-2020-36326  phpmailer
CVE-2019-6339  Drupal
CVE-2018-20148  WordPress
CVE-2018-19296  phpmailer
CVE-2018-1000525  OpenPSA2
CVE-2016-8580  Alienvault
CVE-2014-2294  Open Web Analytics

在对给定Web应用程序中的数据进行反序列化的过程中，当输入未经过消毒时，种格式使传输复杂的数据结构变得容易，并且经常被误用来创建多维cookie和类似的数据结构。由于PHP允许对任意对象进行反序列化，攻击者可以将具有任意属性集的专门准备的对象插入到应用程序中。 根据应用程序实现的不同，攻击者可以触发内部PHP魔法函数，这反过来又可能导致几个漏洞，如代码注入、SQL注入、路径遍历和应用程序拒绝服务，这取决于上下文。比如CVE-2016-8580中Alienvault OSSIM和USM存在对象注入漏洞，允许远程攻击者利用漏洞提交特殊请求注入任意对象到应用程序，删除文件，查看文件，执行本地脚本代码。在CVE-2018-20148中使得攻击者可借助特制的元数据利用该漏洞实施PHP对象注入攻击WordPress 5.0.1之前版本，造成远程命令执行。PHPMailer (CVE-2020-36326, CVE-2018-19296)中的PHP反序列化漏洞，通过传入可控的路径参数到addatattach函数中经过is_file触发[13]。CVE-2019-6339使攻击者利用该漏洞在Drupal后台执行任意的php代码[14]。
针对逐渐增多的php反序列化漏洞，越来越多的安全研究人员开始了对php反序列化漏洞的检测。2013年，Imperva发布的《黑客智能倡议每月趋势报告》第17期分析了反序列化漏洞CVE-2010-3065[15]。2014年，DAHSE等人系统化地分析了对象注入漏洞如何通过POP链进行利用，并通过静态扫描检测对象注入漏洞[16]。在2014年，J Dahse等人引入了一种自动方法来静态检测面向对象PHP代码中的POI漏洞，并能够以自动的方式生成POP链[20]。2018年，陈震杭等人将PHP的敏感函数调用栈作为研究出发点,以Web应用正常运行时的函数调用栈作为判定依据,实现了一个基于PHP敏感函数调用栈的未知反序列化漏洞动态检测与拦截系统[17]。2019年，Koutroumpouchos等人提出ObjectMap工具，用于检测基于Java和PHP的Web应用程序中的反序列化和对象注入功能[18]，但是该工具只能检测所传入HTTP数据包中存在漏洞的参数，并不能给出漏洞发生的堆栈信息。2022年，Sunnyeo Park等人结合了动静态分析以及模糊测试技术，提出了一种可以用于挖掘并利用PHP反序列化漏洞的工具fugio[19]。除此之外，国内也产生一款基于.QL概念搭建好的自动化寻找php反序列化链简单模型phpunserializechain[21]。
目前国内外对反序列化漏洞的研究都主要集中在PHP反序列化链的构造和发掘上，而对于检测PHP反序列化漏洞点并未给出一个全面的方案。比如fugio能够通过静态分析收集所有类和函数信息，以识别所有可用的gadget，经过反馈驱动的模糊处理后，生成利用对象并跟踪已识别链的执行情况，但是对于如何检测发现PHP反序列化漏洞如可控的unserizlize函数并没有给出合适的解决方法。对于这方面的研究，主要还是使用静态检测工具对php源码进行分析，通过正则匹配敏感函数规则的方式或者是利用AST抽象语法树生成程序模型的方式来寻找反序列化漏洞点，例如PHP自动化审计工具seay[7]、RIPS[9]，但是由于静态源代码分析的局限性，需要消耗大量计算成本用于应用程序源代码的解析，而且漏洞是否真正存在也仍然需要代码审计者确认，在漏洞准确率和自动化程度上仍然存在不足。

2009年，Stefan Essar提出了一种针对PHPWeb应用程序对象注入能力的攻击方法[10，11]。通过反序列化来任意修改注入到给定Web应用程序中对象的属性，实现魔术方法的一系列调用来进行攻击。自从Essar提出PHP反序列化问题以来，已经有大量的CVE出现，例如CVE- 2017-12932、CVE-2017-12933、CVE-2017-12934等。在过去的几年里，更是在流行的开源PHP内容管理系统（例如WordPress、Drupal、Joomla和Piwik）中检测到了许多反序列化漏洞，这些漏洞可能导致严重的安全问题，例如远程代码执行，并影响大多数Web服务器。反序列化漏洞在过去和最近几年都有大量出现，介绍了七个被重新定义为反序列化漏洞的记录在案的CVE。

最近，又出现了一些新的php反序列化漏洞，包括CVE-2020-36326 (phpmailer)，CVE-2019-6339 (Drupal)，CVE-2018-20148 (WordPress)，CVE-2018-19296 (phpmailer)，CVE-2018-1000525 (OpenPSA2)，CVE-2016-8580 (Alienvault)和CVE-2014-2294 (Open Web Analytics)。

在对给定Web应用程序中的数据进行反序列化的过程中，如果输入未经过消毒的话，就会发生一些比较严重的安全问题。因为输入的格式使传输复杂的数据结构变得容易，并且很容易被误用来创建多维cookie和类似的数据结构。由于PHP允许对任意对象进行反序列化，所以攻击者可以将具有任意属性集的专门准备的对象插入到应用程序中。 根据应用程序实现的不同，攻击者可以触发内部PHP魔法函数，这反过来又可能导致几个漏洞，例如代码注入、SQL注入、路径遍历和应用程序拒绝服务。

针对不断增多的php反序列化漏洞，越来越多的安全研究人员开始了对php反序列化漏洞的检测。2013年，Imperva发布的《黑客智能倡议每月趋势报告》第17期分析了反序列化漏洞CVE-2010-3065[15]。2014年，DAHSE等人系统化地分析了对象注入漏洞如何通过POP链进行利用，并通过静态扫描检测对象注入漏洞[16]。在2014年，J Dahse等人引入了一种自动方法来静态检测面向对象PHP代码中的POI漏洞，并能够以自动的方式生成POP链[20]。2018年，陈震杭等人将PHP的敏感函数调用栈作为研究出发点,以Web应用正常运行时的函数调用栈作为判定依据,实现了一个基于PHP敏感函数调用栈的未知反序列化漏洞动态检测与拦截系统[17]。2019年，Koutroumpouchos等人提出ObjectMap工具，用于检测基于Java和PHP的Web应用程序中的反序列化和对象注入功能[18]。但是这些工具虽然能够检测出代码中是否存在漏洞，但对于如何检测发现PHP反序列化漏洞如可控的unserialize函数并没有给出合适的解决方法。

当前，对反序列化漏洞的研究主要集中在PHP反序列化链的构造和发掘上。国内外安全研究人员们主要使用静态检测工具对php源码进行分析，从中寻找漏洞点，但是这种方法因为静态源代码分析的局限性，需要消耗大量计算成本用于应用程序源代码的解析，漏洞是否真正存在也仍然需要代码审计者确认，在准确率和自动化程度上还存在不足。

翻译为中文In the article Identifying Gambling and Porn Websites with Image Recognition[1], after analyzing the current methods of website classification, it is argued that the text content based methods suffer from the curse of dimensionality because the websites become more and more complex and massive. A visual content-based website classification was selected to identify gambling and pornographic websites. The SURF model parameters in the BOW model were found to be effective in identifying screenshots of gambling and pornographic websites, and were implemented to distinguish gambling and pornographic websites from normal websites using support vector machines (SVM) by extracting visual features from each webpage screenshot based on the BoW model.
	The article Automatic Detection of Pornographic and Gambling Websites Based on Visual and Textual Content Using a Decision Mechanism[2], proposed the use of Doc2Vec to learn the textual features of the textual content in the hypertext markup language (HTML) source code of a website。In addition, the traditional bag of visual words (BoVW) is improved to better represent the visual features of web screenshots by introducing local spatial relationships of feature points. Then, based on these two types of features, a text classifier and an image classifier are trained to make predictions through a decision mechanism. In the decision mechanism, a data fusion algorithm based on logistic regression(LR) was designed to obtain the final prediction result by measuring the contribution of the two classification results to the final category prediction and the results are experimented to verify the superiority of this method.
	The article Automatic Image Annotation based on Co-Training[3] points out that training a well-performing model usually requires a large number of labeled samples, and manual annotation is costly, so a new semi-supervised automatic image annotation method based on a co-training algorithm is proposed, which can utilize both labeled and The performance is improved by constructing two different classifiers using the co-training method, and the experimental results show that the method has better labeling performance than many existing automatic image standard methods.
Through reading the above-mentioned literature, we understand that the following problems still exist in the current research on the identification of blackmail websites at home and abroad: (1) insufficient use of webpage content, lack of research on the extraction of a large amount of available textual information in webpage screenshots; (2) using only the unimodal data of images, the identification accuracy needs to be improved, and the second article combines two types of features to improve the identification accuracy to a certain extent. (3) Few sample data with labels, high labor and time cost to build the dataset.
By reading the above literature, we can find that the current identification for blackmail websites can be mainly based on visual features and text features, and there are various classification methods for text and images, and most of the current research is based on a single feature or applying a single method for classification and identification. Inspired by the second literature, we can combine image and text features and combine the current research on text classification and image classification based on deep learning, which has outstanding performance in this field, to improve the accuracy of recognition and classification. Through the third article, we can apply collaborative training algorithm to improve the generalization of the model and optimize the model.

在文章“利用图像识别技术识别赌博和色情网站”的分析之后[1]，通过分析当前的网站分类方法，认为基于文本内容的方法由于网站变得越来越复杂和庞大而受到维度灾难的困扰。选择基于视觉内容的网站分类来识别赌博和色情网站。在BOW模型中，SURF模型参数被发现对于识别赌博和色情网站的屏幕截图非常有效，并且通过从每个网页屏幕截图中提取视觉特征来实现对赌博和色情网站的区分并使用支持向量机（SVM）进行分类。

在文章“基于文本和视觉内容的自动检测色情和赌博网站的决策机制”[2]中，提出使用Doc2Vec来学习网页的超文本标记语言（HTML）源代码中文本内容的文本特征。此外，通过引入特征点的局部空间关系，改进了传统的视觉词袋（BoVW）以更好地表示Web屏幕截图的视觉特征。然后，基于这两种类型的特征，训练文本分类器和图像分类器，并通过决策机制进行预测。在决策机制中，设计了一种基于逻辑回归（LR）的数据融合算法，通过测量两种分类结果对最终分类预测的贡献来获得最终的预测结果，并通过实验验证了该方法的优越性。

文章“基于协同训练的自动图像标注”[3]指出，训练性能良好的模型通常需要大量标记样本，而手动注释的成本很高，因此提出了一种基于协同训练算法的半监督自动图像标注方法，可以利用标记和未标记

在文章《利用图像识别技术识别赌博和色情网站》中，分析了当前网站分类方法后，提出了基于文本内容的方法存在维度灾难问题，因为网站变得越来越复杂和庞大。因此选择基于视觉内容的网站分类方法来识别赌博和色情网站。研究发现，BOW模型中的SURF模型参数对于识别赌博和色情网站的截图非常有效，通过从每个网页截图中提取视觉特征，使用支持向量机（SVM）实现了从普通网站中区分赌博和色情网站。
在文章《基于文本和视觉内容的决策机制对色情和赌博网站的自动检测》中，提出使用Doc2Vec学习网站HTML源代码中文本内容的文本特征。此外，改进传统的局部词袋（BoVW）以更好地表示网页截图的视觉特征，引入了特征点的局部空间关系。然后根据这两种特征，训练文本分类器和图像分类器，通过决策机制进行预测。该决策机制使用基于逻辑回归（LR）的数据融合算法，通过测量两种分类结果对最终类别预测的贡献来获得最终预测结果，并进行实验验证以证明该方法的优越性。
文章《基于协同训练的自动图像标注》指出，训练一个表现良好的模型通常需要大量带标签的样本，手动注释的成本很高，因此提出了一种基于协同训练算法的新型半监督自动图像标注方法，它可以利用带标签和不带标签的数据，通过构建两个不同的分类器来提高性能，实验结果显示该方法比许多现有的自动图像标准方法具有更好的标注性能。
通过阅读以上文献，我们了解到国内外当前黑客攻击网站的识别仍存在以下问题：（1）未充分使用网页内容，缺少对从网页截图中提取大量可用文本信息的研究；（2）仅使用图像单模态数据，识别准确度需提高，第二篇论文将两种特征结合起来，以一定程度上提高识别准确度；（3）带有标签的样本数据较少，构建数据集的劳动力和时间成本较高。
通过阅读以上文献，我们可以发现当前黑客攻击网站的识别主要可以基于视觉和文本特征，并且存在各种文本和图像分类方法，大部分当前研究都基于单一特征或者应用单一分类方法进行分类和识别。受第二篇论文启发，我们可以结合图像和文本特征，并结合目前在深度学习领域中基于文本分类和图像分类的研究，来提高识别和分类的精确度。通过第三篇论文，我们可以应用协同训练算法来提高模型的泛化能力和优化模型。

翻译为中文。Through the analysis of the current research status of the detection of blackmail websites at home and abroad, the detection correct rate using single modal recognition is not high, the pure image detection method has limitations for specific web pages, the robustness is not strong, and the survival cycle of online blackmail websites is short, and the existing labeled data set is small, in response to the above existing problems, we propose to introduce more information in the training process, through multimodal features, adding web page screenshots OCR extracted text content, combined with the integrated algorithm, using semi-supervised collaborative training, the process of identifying and classifying the blackmail websites takes multimodal features identification.
Combined with the above analysis, we propose a method for identifying blackmail websites based on OCR multimodal features, and the main process is as follows: OCR technology is used to extract the text in web screenshots to solve the problem of insufficient utilization of text information, and combining the current outstanding performance of deep learning-based text classification and image classification research in this field, we choose the deep learning-based classifier, a labeled sample set is established to train image classifiers and text classifiers to solve the problem of low recognition accuracy caused by a single modality, and a semi-supervised collaborative training method is used to enrich the sample data The model generalization is improved. The methods involved in this study are: image classification, OCR, text classification, and collaborative training.

通过对国内外黑客攻击网站的检测研究现状的分析，发现使用单模态识别的检测正确率不高，纯图像检测方法对于特定的网页有限制，健壮性不强，而在线勒索网站的生存周期较短，现有的带标签数据集较小。为了应对以上现有问题，我们提出引入更多信息在训练过程中，通过多模态特征，添加网页截图OCR提取的文本内容，结合综合算法，使用半监督协同训练，实现对勒索网站的识别和分类的多模态特征识别过程。
结合以上分析，我们提出一种基于OCR多模态特征识别黑客攻击网站的方法，主要过程如下：利用OCR技术提取网页截图中的文本，解决文本信息利用不足的问题，结合目前在深度学习领域中基于文本分类和图像分类研究的杰出表现，选择深度学习的分类器，建立带标签的样本训练图像分类器和文本分类器，解决单模态导致识别精度低的问题，并采用半监督协同训练方法，丰富样本数据以及提高模型泛化能力。本研究所涉及到的方法有：图像分类、OCR文本识别、文本分类和协同训练。

根据下面文字写一篇文献综述。奇安信CERT最新发布的2022年度全网漏洞态势研究报告显示，当前网络攻防形势愈发严峻，各类安全事件层出不穷[3]。近年来，反序列化成为网络攻击中越来越严重的问题之一，除了SQL注入和XSS等老问题。OWASP在2017年发布的十大web漏洞威胁中，不安全的反序列化[4]和使用含有已知漏洞的组件分别位列榜单前列。由于很多PHP和Java开发程序都依赖于第三方组件，这些组件可能存在反序列化漏洞，因此，反序列化攻击与已知漏洞的组件使用是密切相关的。PHP反序列化或对象注入漏洞最早在2009年被发现[5]，攻击者可以通过向unserialize() PHP函数提供恶意输入，执行多种恶意攻击。尽管反序列化漏洞最早在PHP语言中出现，但近年来在Java、Python等面向对象语言的应用中也频繁出现。与其他漏洞相比，利用反序列化漏洞可以直接进行远程代码执行、本地文件读写等多种高危操作，造成的危害极大，而且攻击成本较低。根据W3Techs发布的统计数据，PHP在WEB网站服务器端使用的编程语言份额高达78.9%[1]，反序列化漏洞更为普遍，例如CVE-2015—8562漏洞就几乎每日受到16000次黑客扫描攻击[6]，其危害程度之大不容小觑。
然而，针对PHP反序列化漏洞的研究主要集中在PHP反序列化链的自动化检测上。对于如何发现一个可控的反序列化漏洞点，仍然缺乏一个合适的工具。目前，主要利用自动化审计工具人工阅读Web应用程序的源代码进行代码审计，查找反序列化漏洞的特征，如使用PHP内置的反序列化函数unserialize()时，是否进行了数据的过滤和校验等。虽然这种方法具有较高的准确率，但效率不高。
因此，Web安全领域急需解决如何快速检测反序列化漏洞的问题。通过对PHP序列化机制和反序列化漏洞的研究，发现在反序列化攻击中，大部分都是通过调用unserialize反序列化敏感函数或者是通过phar协议[8]触发常见文件相关协议，如if_file函数实现的。当用户输入带有恶意语句的参数流向反序列化敏感函数时，未经过滤或过滤不严，就可能导致漏洞的发生。
根据上述研究，本文基于动态污点分析技术，设计了一种自动化检测PHP反序列化漏洞的系统，以PHP扩展的形式快速集成到待检测PHPWeb应用环境中。通过网络爬虫进行爬取触发反序列化敏感函数，快速定位触发反序列化漏洞点，例如unserialize敏感函数的堆栈信息，有助于还原漏洞机理。这种方法可以提高反序列化漏洞检测的效率和准确率，为Web应用的安全提供更加可靠的解决方案。

在2009年，Stefan Essar提出了一种针对PHP Web应用程序中的对象注入能力的攻击方法[10, 11]。通过滥用攻击者的能力，借助反序列化过程，任意修改注入到给定Web应用程序中的对象属性，实现魔术方法的逐步调用，进而完成攻击。自Essar提出PHP反序列化问题以来，已出现大量CVE，如CVE-2017-12932，CVE-2017-12933，CVE-2017-12934等。在过去几年里，许多开源PHP内容管理系统（如WordPress，Drupal，Joomla和Piwik）也发现了许多反序列化漏洞。这些漏洞可能导致远程代码执行等严重安全问题，影响大部分Web服务器。反序列化漏洞在过去和最近几年频繁出现（如表所示的七个反序列化漏洞的备案CVE）。

近期出现的PHP反序列化漏洞：

| CVE编号 | 受影响应用 | 参考链接 |
| — | — | — |
| CVE-2020-36326 | PHPMailer | [13] |
| CVE-2019-6339 | Drupal | [14] |
| CVE-2018-20148 | WordPress | - |
| CVE-2018-19296 | PHPMailer | [13] |
| CVE-2018-1000525 | OpenPSA2 | - |
| CVE-2016-8580 | Alienvault | - |
| CVE-2014-2294 | Open Web Analytics | - |

在给定Web应用程序中的数据反序列化过程中，当输入未经过消毒时，种格式使传输复杂数据结构变得容易，并且经常被误用来创建多维cookie和类似数据结构。由于PHP允许对任意对象进行反序列化，攻击者可以将具备任意属性集的专门准备的对象插入应用程序。根据应用程序实现的差异，攻击者可以触发内部PHP魔法函数，这反过来可能导致诸如代码注入、SQL注入、路径遍历和应用程序拒绝服务等漏洞，具体取决于上下文。例如，在CVE-2016-8580中，Alienvault OSSIM和USM存在对象注入漏洞，允许远程攻击者利用漏洞提交特殊请求注入任意对象到应用程序，删除文件，查看文件，执行本地脚本代码。在CVE-2018-20148中，攻击者可以通过特制元数据利用该漏洞实施PHP对象注入攻击，影响WordPress 5.0.1之前的版本，导致远程命令执行。PHPMailer（CVE-2020-36326，CVE-2018-19296）中的PHP反序列化漏洞通过传入可控路径参数到addAttachment函数后，经过is_file触发[13]。CVE-2019-6339使攻击者利用漏洞在Drupal后台执行任意PHP代码[14]。

针对日益增多的PHP反序列化漏洞，越来越多的安全研究人员开始探讨PHP反序列化漏洞的检测。例如，Imperva发布的《黑客智能倡议每月趋势报告》第17期分析了反序列化漏洞CVE-2010-3065[15]。2014年，Dahse等研究者系统化地分析了对象注入漏洞如何通过POP链进行利用，并通过静态扫描检测对象注入漏洞[16]。2014年，J Dahse等人引入了一种自动方法来静态检测面向对象PHP代码中的POI漏洞，并能够以自动方式生成POP链[20]。2018年，陈震杭等人将PHP的敏感函数调用栈作为研究出发点，以Web应用正常运行时的函数调用栈作为判定依据，实现了一个基于PHP敏感函数调用栈的未知反序列化漏洞动态检测与拦截系统[17]。2019年，Koutroumpouchos等人提出ObjectMap工具，用于检测基于Java和PHP的Web应用程序中的反序列化和对象注入功能[18]；但该工具只能检测所传入HTTP数据包中存在漏洞的参数，并不能给出漏洞发生的堆栈信息。2022年，Sunnyeo Park等人结合动、静态分析和模糊测试技术，提出了一种用于挖掘并利用PHP反序列化漏洞的工具——fugio[19]。此外，还有一款基于QL概念搭建的php反序列化链简单模型—phpunserializechain[21]。

尽管如此，目前国内外对反序列化漏洞的研究主要集中在PHP反序列化链的构造和发掘上，对于检测PHP反序列化漏洞点如可控的unserialize函数并未给出全面方案。例如，fugio能够通过静态分析收集所有类和函数信息，以识别所有可用的gadget，经过反馈驱动的模糊处理后，生成利用对象并跟踪已识别链的执行情况，但未给出如何检测发现PHP反序列化漏洞的合适解决方案。对于这方面的研究，主要还是利用静态检测工具，对PHP源码进行分析，通过正则匹配敏感函数规则的方式或者利用AST抽象语法树生成程序模型的方式，来寻找反序列化漏洞点。例如，PHP自动化审计工具seay[7]和RIPS[9]。但由于静态源代码分析的局限性，需要消耗大量计算成本用于应用程序源代码解析，同时漏洞是否真正存在仍需代码审计者确认。因此，漏洞准确率和自动化程度仍有待提高。

这篇文献综述主要讨论了反序列化漏洞在网络攻击中的重要性，特别是在PHP应用程序中的广泛应用。文章首先介绍了反序列化漏洞的基本原理和攻击方法，并列举了一些最近几年出现的反序列化漏洞案例。接下来，文章重点讨论了如何检测反序列化漏洞，指出当前主要的方法仍然是通过人工阅读源代码进行审计。然而，这种方法存在效率低下的问题，因此需要更加智能化的解决方案。

文章进一步介绍了目前针对反序列化漏洞检测的研究情况，包括静态分析工具和动态污点分析技术等，重点讨论了基于动态污点分析技术的自动化检测系统。该系统利用网络爬虫触发反序列化敏感函数，快速定位漏洞点，并通过堆栈信息还原漏洞机理，有效提高了检测效率和准确率。此外，文章还总结了目前国内外研究反序列化漏洞的主要趋势，并指出未来需要探索更加高效的自动化检测方案，提高漏洞检测的准确率和自动化程度。

总之，这篇文献综述提供了一些有价值的研究方向和方法，有助于进一步加强PHP应用程序的安全性，预防反序列化漏洞等安全问题的出现。但同时也需要注意，网络安全是一个不断变化和发展的领域，我们需要持续关注最新的攻击方法和漏洞发现，不断创新和完善防御策略。

conversation.content: 对下面文字进行总结，要求字数500字。A PHP object injection (POI) vulnerability is a security-critical bug that allows the remote code execution of class methods existing in a vulnerable PHP application. Exploiting this vulnerability often requires sophisticated property-oriented programming to shape an injection object. Existing off-the-shelf tools focus only on identifying potential POI vulnerabilities without confirming the presence of any exploit objects. To this end, we propose FUGIO, the first automatic exploit generation (AEG) tool for POI vulnerabilities. FUGIO conducts coarse-grained static and dynamic program analyses to generate a list of gadget chains that serve as blueprints for exploit objects. FUGIO then runs fuzzing campaigns using these identified chains and produces exploit objects. FUGIO generated 68 exploit objects from 30 applications containing known POI vulnerabilities with zero false positives. FUGIO also found two previously unreported POI vulnerabilities with five exploits, demonstrating its efficacy in generating functional exploits.

A PHP object injection vulnerability can lead to the remote code execution of class methods in a vulnerable PHP application. Existing tools only identify potential vulnerabilities without confirming the presence of any exploit objects. FUGIO, an automatic exploit generation tool, is proposed to generate exploit objects for POI vulnerabilities. FUGIO uses static and dynamic program analyses to generate gadget chains, which act as blueprints for exploit objects, and runs fuzzing campaigns to produce exploits. FUGIO generated 68 exploit objects from 30 applications with no false positives and discovered two previously unreported vulnerabilities with five exploits.
翻译为中文

PHP对象注入（POI）漏洞是一种安全批次，允许攻击者利用存在漏洞的PHP应用程序中的类方法进行远程代码执行。利用此漏洞通常需要使用复杂的面向属性编程来构建注入对象。现有的现成工具仅专注于识别潜在的POI漏洞，而没有确认任何利用对象的存在。因此，我们提出了FUGIO，这是首个用于POI漏洞的自动利用生成(AEG)工具。FUGIO使用粗粒度的静态和动态程序分析来生成提供作为利用对象蓝图的小工具链清单。然后，FUGIO使用这些已识别的链进行fuzzing攻击，并生成利用对象。FUGIO从包含已知POI漏洞的30个应用程序中生成了68个利用对象，且无误报。FUGIO还发现了两个以前未报告的POI漏洞，有五个利用效果，证明了FUGIO在生成实用利用方面的有效性。
写成文献综述

【文献综述】自动化漏洞利用生成对PHP注入漏洞的应用

随着互联网应用的不断发展，Web应用程序的重要性日益增强。然而，Web应用程序中的安全漏洞也越来越频繁地被利用，给信息安全带来了极大的威胁。PHP是互联网应用程序中广泛使用的编程语言，常常为恶意攻击者提供了可利用的漏洞入口。其中，PHP对象注入(POI)漏洞是一种常见的安全漏洞，允许攻击者远程执行存在漏洞的PHP应用程序中的类方法。

自动化漏洞利用生成(AEG)是一种自动化技术，用于通过分析应用程序的行为和结构来生成利用漏洞的恶意代码。对于PHP注入漏洞来说，现有的自动化工具仅能识别潜在的漏洞，但无法确认漏洞是否存在可利用的注入对象。于是，研究人员提出了FUGIO，这是首个用于POI漏洞的自动利用生成工具。

FUGIO使用静态和动态程序分析来生成即将用于注入的小工具链清单。通过这些小工具链，FUGIO可以生成可利用的注入对象，并使用fuzzing攻击来生成实用的利用代码。研究证明，FUGIO可以从含有已知POI漏洞的30个应用程序中生成68个利用对象，且无误报。 FUGIO还可以发现之前未被报告的注入漏洞，同时生成相应的利用代码。

这项研究的贡献在于，FUGIO不仅可以识别注入漏洞，而且可以自动生成利用代码，而无需人为干预。此外，FUGIO在POI漏洞的利用方面表现出良好的效能，能够发现新的漏洞和生成新的利用代码。

然而，这项技术仍存在一些局限性。由于FUGIO是基于静态和动态程序分析的，因此当程序在运行时具有不确定性时，FUGIO可能会错误地生成利用代码。此外，当程序过于复杂时，FUGIO的运行时间可能会显著延长。因此，研究人员需要进一步完善FUGIO的技术，以提高其准确性和效率。

总之，自动化漏洞利用生成技术在信息安全领域的应用前景广阔。此项研究为这一领域的发展提供了一个重要的样本，表明了通过自动化技术生成利用某些复杂漏洞的恶意代码的可能性。

Memory corruption vulnerabilities that lead to control-flow hijacking attacks are a common problem for binary executables and such attacks are known for more than two decades. Over the last few years, especially code reuse attacks attracted a lot of attention. In such attacks, an adversary does not need to inject her own code during the exploitation phase, but she reuses existing code fragments (so called gadgets) to build a code chain that performs malicious computations on her behalf. Return-oriented programming (ROP) is a well-known technique that bypasses many existing defenses. Surprisingly, code reuse attacks are also a viable attack vector against web applications.

In this paper, we study code reuse attacks in the context of PHP-based web applications. We analyze how PHP object injection (POI) vulnerabilities can be exploited via property-oriented programming (POP) and perform a systematic analysis of available gadgets in common PHP applications. Furthermore, we introduce an automated approach to statically detect POI vulnerabilities in object-oriented PHP code. Our approach is also capable of generating POP chains in an automated way. We implemented a prototype of the proposed approach and evaluated it with 10 well-known applications. Overall, we detected 30 new POI vulnerabilities and 28 new gadget chains.

这段文章讨论了内存损坏漏洞，以及在这些漏洞中使用代码重用的攻击方式，尤其是返回导向编程（ROP）技术。此外，文章还提出了一种针对Web应用程序的代码重用攻击方法。具体来说，文章分析了如何通过POP利用PHP对象注入漏洞，并对常见的PHP应用程序中的可用gadget进行了系统分析。文章还引入了一种自动化方法，可以静态检测基于对象的PHP代码中的POI漏洞，同时也能够自动生成POP链。研究人员应用该方法的原型并在10个知名应用程序上进行了评估，共发现了30个新的POI漏洞和28个新的gadget链。

本文综述了一项针对PHP Web应用程序中的代码重用攻击的研究。尽管代码重用攻击主要是针对二进制可执行文件，但该研究表明，这种攻击方式也可以用于Web应用程序中，特别是PHP Web应用程序。研究人员发现，通过POP和gadget，攻击者可以利用POI漏洞来进行代码重用攻击。为了解决这个问题，该研究提出了一种自动化方法来检测和生成POP链，以及检测POI漏洞。该方法已实现原型，并在10个知名Web应用程序上进行了测试，发现了新的漏洞和gadget链。这项研究表明了代码重用攻击对于Web应用程序的危害性，提供了一种新的检测POI漏洞的方法，并为该领域的进一步研究提供了新的方向。

通过对国内外打击勒索网站的研究现状进行分析，单一模态识别的检测正确率不高，纯图像检测方法对特定网页存在局限性，稳健性不强，在线勒索网站的生存周期较短，现有的标注数据集较小。针对上述现有问题，我们提出在训练过程中引入更多的信息，通过多模态特征，加入网页截图OCR提取的文本内容，结合综合算法，采用半监督协同训练，实现对勒索网站的识别与分类过程采用多模态特征识别。结合上述分析，我们提出了一种基于OCR多模态特征的勒索网站识别方法，主要流程如下：采用OCR技术提取网页截图中的文本，解决文本信息利用不充分的问题，结合当前在该领域基于深度学习的文本分类和图像分类研究的杰出表现，我们选择基于深度学习的分类器，建立标注样本集，训练图像分类器和文本分类器，解决单一模态造成的识别准确率低的问题，并采用半监督协同训练方法，丰富样本数据，提高模型的泛化能力。本研究涉及的方法包括图像分类、OCR、文本分类和协同训练。

翻译为标准英语。在文章{FUGIO}: Automatic Exploit Generation for {PHP} Object Injection Vulnerabilities中提出了首个用于POI漏洞的自动利用生成(AEG)工具FUGIO。FUGIO使用粗粒度的静态和动态程序分析来生成提供作为利用对象蓝图的小工具链清单。然后，FUGIO使用这些已识别的链进行fuzzing攻击，并生成利用对象。研究证明，FUGIO可以从含有已知POI漏洞的30个应用程序中生成68个利用对象，且无误报。 FUGIO还可以发现之前未被报告的注入漏洞，同时生成相应的利用代码。然而，这项技术仍存在一些局限性。由于FUGIO是基于静态和动态程序分析的，因此当程序在运行时具有不确定性时，FUGIO可能会错误地生成利用代码。此外，当程序过于复杂时，FUGIO的运行时间可能会显著延长。

文章ObjectMap: detecting insecure object deserialization研究提出了一个用于检测Java和PHP Web应用程序中的反序列化和对象注入漏洞的可扩展工具ObjectMap。但该工具只能检测所传入HTTP数据包中存在漏洞的参数，并不能给出漏洞发生的堆栈信息，因此也存在一定的局限性。并且在此基础上，该研究还介绍了首个反序列化测试环境，以测试反序列化漏洞检测工具和教育目的。这些工具具有易于扩展的特点，并且结合了跨度互补的功能，能够引起更多的研究并促进更丰富的解决方案的开发。总之，该文章为Web应用程序中的反序列化漏洞问题提供了一种新方法和思路。

文章Code Reuse Attacks in PHP: Automated POP Chain Generation综述了一项针对PHP Web应用程序中的代码重用攻击的研究。尽管代码重用攻击主要是针对二进制可执行文件，但该研究表明，这种攻击方式也可以用于Web应用程序中，特别是PHP Web应用程序。研究人员发现，通过POP和gadget，攻击者可以利用POI漏洞来进行代码重用攻击。为了解决这个问题，该研究提出了一种自动化方法来检测和生成POP链，以及检测POI漏洞。该方法已实现原型，并在10个知名Web应用程序上进行了测试，发现了新的漏洞和gadget链。这项研究表明了代码重用攻击对于Web应用程序的危害性，提供了一种新的检测POI漏洞的方法，并为该领域的进一步研究提供了新的方向。

然而通过阅读上诉文献，我们可以发现针对PHP反序列化漏洞的研究主要集中在PHP反序列化链的自动化检测上。对于如何发现一个可控的反序列化漏洞点，仍然缺乏一个合适的工具。目前，主要利用自动化审计工具人工阅读Web应用程序的源代码进行代码审计，查找反序列化漏洞的特征，如使用PHP内置的反序列化函数unserialize()时，是否进行了数据的过滤和校验等。虽然这种方法具有较高的准确率，但效率不高。
受第二篇和第三篇文章的启发，我们基于动态检测技术Hook PHP内置函数，并利用爬虫程序向PHP应用程序接口发送HTTP数据包，当敏感反序列化函数被触发时，检查参数是否受到污染来判别是否存在反序列化漏洞。

The article "FUGIO: Automatic Exploit Generation for PHP Object Injection Vulnerabilities" presents the first automatic exploit generation (AEG) tool for POI vulnerabilities, called FUGIO. FUGIO uses coarse-grained static and dynamic program analysis to generate a list of small toolchains that serve as blueprints for potential exploitable objects. FUGIO then employs fuzzing attacks using these identified chains to generate exploit objects. The research demonstrates that FUGIO can generate 68 exploit objects from 30 applications with known POI vulnerabilities, without any false positives. FUGIO can also detect previously unreported injection vulnerabilities and generate corresponding exploit code. However, this technique still has limitations. FUGIO solely based on static and dynamic program analysis, and therefore may incorrectly generate exploit code when programs have runtime uncertainties. Furthermore, FUGIO's execution time may significantly increase when dealing with complex programs.

The article "ObjectMap: detecting insecure object deserialization" proposes a scalable tool, ObjectMap, for detecting deserialization and object injection vulnerabilities in Java and PHP web applications. However, this tool can only detect parameters with vulnerabilities in passed HTTP packets and cannot provide stack trace information, making it limited. Furthermore, the article also introduces the first deserialization testing environment for testing deserialization vulnerability detection tools and educational purposes. These tools are easily expandable and complement each other, leading to more research and development of richer solutions. In conclusion, the article provides a new approach and perspective for addressing deserialization vulnerabilities in web applications.

The article "Code Reuse Attacks in PHP: Automated POP Chain Generation" reviews research on code reuse attacks in PHP web applications. Although code reuse attacks primarily target binary executable files, this study demonstrates that this attack method can also be employed in web applications, particularly PHP web applications. The researchers found that attackers can exploit POI vulnerabilities through POP and gadget chains for code reuse attacks. To address this, they proposed an automated method for detecting and generating POP chains, as well as detecting POI vulnerabilities. The method has been implemented as a prototype and tested on ten well-known web applications, discovering new vulnerabilities and gadget chains. This research highlights the harm of code reuse attacks on web applications, provides a new method for detecting POI vulnerabilities, and offers new directions for further research in the field.

However, based on the reviewed literature, we find that research on PHP deserialization vulnerabilities mainly focuses on automated detection of deserialization chains. There is a lack of suitable tools for discovering a controllable deserialization vulnerability point. Currently, the main approach is to use automated auditing tools to manually read the source code of web applications, looking for signs of deserialization vulnerabilities such as whether the data filtering and validation are performed when using the built-in unserialize() function in PHP. Although this method has high accuracy, its efficiency is low. Inspired by the second and third articles, we propose a dynamic detection technique by hooking PHP built-in functions, sending HTTP packets to PHP application interfaces using a crawler program, and checking whether the parameter is contaminated when sensitive deserialization functions are triggered to determine the existence of deserialization vulnerabilities.

翻译为标准的英文。奇安信CERT最新发布的2022年度全网漏洞态势研究报告显示，当前网络攻防形势愈发严峻，各类安全事件层出不穷。近年来，除了SQL注入和XSS等老问题，反序列化漏洞成为网络攻击中越来越严重的问题之一。OWASP在2017年发布的十大web漏洞威胁中，不安全的反序列化就位列榜单前列。由于很多PHP和Java开发程序都依赖于第三方组件，这些组件可能存在反序列化漏洞，因此，反序列化攻击与已知漏洞的组件使用是密切相关的。PHP反序列化或对象注入漏洞最早在2009年被发现，攻击者可以通过向unserialize() PHP函数提供恶意输入，执行多种恶意攻击。尽管反序列化漏洞最早在PHP语言中出现，但近年来在Java、Python等面向对象语言的应用中也频繁出现。与其他漏洞相比，利用反序列化漏洞可以直接进行远程代码执行、本地文件读写等多种高危操作，造成的危害极大，而且攻击成本较低，其危害程度之大不容小觑。
因此，Web安全领域急需解决如何快速检测反序列化漏洞的问题。国内外对于PHP反序列化漏洞检测技术研究提出了各种方法，为进一步提高检测准确率提供了理论参考。本文对国内外相关文献进行了整理和总结。

The latest 2022 Annual Network Vulnerability State Research Report from Qihoo 360's CERT reveals that the current cybersecurity landscape is increasingly severe, with numerous security incidents occurring. In addition to traditional issues such as SQL injection and XSS, deserialization vulnerabilities have become one of the most severe problems in network attacks in recent years. In OWASP's 2017 Top 10 Web Vulnerability Threats, unsafe deserialization ranked high on the list. As many PHP and Java development programs rely on third-party components, these can often contain deserialization vulnerabilities. Therefore, deserialization attacks are closely related to the use of known-vulnerable components.

Deserialization or object injection vulnerabilities in PHP were first discovered in 2009. Attackers can exploit the unserialize() PHP function by providing malicious input and executing various malicious attacks. While deserialization vulnerabilities first appeared in PHP, they have frequently occurred in applications using object-oriented languages such as Java and Python in recent years. Compared with other vulnerabilities, exploiting deserialization vulnerabilities can directly perform dangerous operations such as remote code execution and local file read-write operations. The resulting harm is significant, and the attack cost is low, making it particularly dangerous.

Therefore, there is an urgent need to address the issue of how to quickly detect deserialization vulnerabilities in the web security field. Various methods for detecting PHP deserialization vulnerabilities have been proposed by international scholars and experts, providing theoretical references to enhance detection accuracy. This paper summarizes relevant domestic and foreign literature on this topic.

翻译为中文。With the rapid development of the Internet, gambling and pornography and other black production websites are increasingly harmful to the ecological health of the network. Given the serious harm of black production websites, the rapidity of their dissemination and the wide range of geographical areas, it is crucial to identify black production websites efficiently and accurately. In this paper, we analyze the current domestic and international research on issues related to the identification of blackmail websites, and generally summarize and sort out the relevant literature. We intend to conduct further research on multimodal identification by combining the current technical means of website identification, propose the OCR multimodal feature-based identification method for blackmail websites, using OCR to extract text information, and combining deep learning to classify images and texts respectively.

随着互联网的快速发展，赌博和色情等黑色产业网站对网络生态健康带来的危害越来越大。鉴于黑色产业网站的严重危害、传播速度迅速和地域范围广泛等特点，高效准确地识别黑色产业网站具有重要意义。本文分析了当前国内外关于识别勒索网站的相关问题的研究现状，概括归纳了相关文献。通过结合当前的网站识别技术手段，我们拟对多模态识别展开深入研究，提出基于OCR多模态特征的勒索网站识别方法，利用OCR提取文本信息，结合深度学习分别对图像和文本进行分类。

Title: Scotland in October: A Magical Journey Through Autumn

Introduction:
As the autumn season arrives and casts a golden glow over mesmerizing landscapes and cityscapes alike, Scotland in October is an experience to cherish. From vibrant foliage to welcoming festivals, this enchanting country offers a kaleidoscope of colors, flavors, and events perfect for those in search of a unique getaway. To help you make the most out of your trip, here is a detailed guide that will lead you through the captivating beauty of Scotland in October.

Weather:
As October sets in, expect a touch of crispness in the air with daytime temperatures ranging between 9°C and 13°C. While there's still enough warmth to enjoy outdoor activities, the weather can be unpredictable at times. It's wise to pack a waterproof jacket and some layers for your adventures, but don't forget to bring an umbrella as well. A general rule of thumb is to remember the Scottish saying: "There's no such thing as bad weather, only the wrong clothes."

Outdoor Activities:
In October, nature is at its picturesque best, offering a visual treat for those who relish in outdoor activities. Here are some experiences you shouldn't miss when travelling to Scotland at this time of the year:

1. Autumn Foliage: Scotland in October is synonymous with spectacular fall foliage. Be sure to visit the Royal Botanic Garden in Edinburgh or Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park for an unforgettable walk amidst vibrant autumn colors.

2. Wildlife Watching: The cooler months are perfect for spotting red deer, seals, and red squirrels in their natural habitat. The Isle of Jura or the Isle of Mull are excellent choices for wildlife enthusiasts.

3. Fungi Foray: The damp, autumnal conditions in Scotland make it a haven for fungi. Take a guided tour through Forestry and Land Scotland woodlands to appreciate the unique and fascinating world of mushrooms and other fungi.

Events and Festivals:
October is an excellent time to immerse yourself in Scotland's rich culture and thriving arts scene through various events and festivals:

1. Callander Jazz and Blues Festival (Early October): Held in the picturesque Trossachs town of Callander, this festival features a wide variety of performances, from big band swing to energetic jazz and blues.

2. The Enchanted Forest (Throughout October): This award-winning sound and light show in Faskally Woods near Pitlochry will leave you mesmerized. The dazzling display amid the spectacular woodland setting promises an unforgettable experience.

3. Scottish International Storytelling Festival (Mid to Late October): Celebrating the art of storytelling, this Edinburgh-based festival is perfect for anyone who loves tales of adventure, mystery, and folklore.

Dining and Whisky:
The Scottish culinary scene flourishes with seasonal ingredients showcasing the bounty of autumn. Indulge in dishes featuring wild game like venison, pheasant, and grouse, while sampling traditional dishes like haggis or Cullen skink, a delicious smoked fish soup. Don't forget about Scotland's national drink – whisky. October is the perfect time to visit the numerous distilleries, learn about the art of whisky making, and taste the famous single malt creations.

Conclusion:
As you venture into the enchanting world of Scotland in October, be prepared for a magical experience. Whether you seek outdoor adventure, immerse yourself in arts and culture or relish in culinary delights, this stunning country promises to leave you with memories as vivid as the golden leaves that carpet its landscapes. So pack those layers and embark on your Scottish escapade this autumn.

Title: A Journey Through Scotland in December

Introduction:

Scotland in December is a magical time when the land is draped in frosty landscapes and twinkling fairy lights, making it a wonderland for travelers. Although the temperature drops, it merely adds excitement to an unforgettable Scottish experience. This guide aims to take you through a detailed journey of the best places to visit, things to do, events to attend and tips to keep in mind while traveling through Scotland in December.

Exploring Scotland's Cities:

1) Edinburgh: As Scotland's capital, Edinburgh is a city rich in history, culture, and festivities. In December, the city celebrates Christmas and prepares for the world-famous Hogmanay Festival. Here, you can find a spectacular Christmas market, complete with horse-drawn carriage rides, mulled wine stalls, and outdoor ice-skating rinks. Other attractions include the Edinburgh Castle, Holyrood Palace, and the lively streets of the Royal Mile.

2) Glasgow: In December, Glasgow's city center transforms into a sparkling holiday wonderland. Popular gathering spots like George Square and Buchanan Street are adorned with festive lights and decorations, drawing locals and tourists alike. The vibrant shopping district in Glasgow is perfect for finding unique gifts, while the city's cutting-edge culinary scene provides a delicious way to keep warm during the chilly evenings.

Enjoying Scotland's Natural Beauty:

1) The Cairngorms National Park: December presents an excellent opportunity to experience the beauty of the Scottish Highlands. The Cairngorms National Park, nestled in the eastern Highlands, offers breathtaking views of snow-capped mountains, icy lochs, and ancient forests. For adventurous travelers, ski or snowboard down the slopes of the Cairngorm Mountain, or simply cuddle by the fireplace in a cozy, Highland lodge.

2) Loch Ness: Visiting the infamous Loch Ness in December offers a unique and serene experience. With fewer tourists around, you'll have a chance to take in the natural beauty of the loch without the crowds. A visit to the nearby Urquhart Castle, a medieval fortress that overlooks the loch, will reward you with spectacular views.

Festive Scottish Experiences:

1) Christmas Markets and Festivals: Cities and towns across Scotland host enchanting Christmas markets and festivals throughout December. Be sure to visit the Aberdeen Winter Festival, the Perth Festive Party Nights, and the St. Andrews Christmas Lights Switch-On. These events offer local delicacies, unique gift items, and entertaining performances by local Scottish talent.

2) Hogmanay Festival: Celebrate the end of the year in true Scottish style through the traditional Hogmanay festival. The city of Edinburgh hosts a massive street party on the 31st of December, with live music, dancing, fireworks, and exhilarating festivities. Towns such as Inverness, Stirling, and Dundee also offer fantastic Hogmanay celebrations.

Scotland Travel Tips for December:

1) Prepare for cold weather: Layer up with cozy clothing and bring a waterproof jacket to keep you warm and dry while wandering through the winter marvels of Scotland. Don't forget your hat, gloves, and a sturdy pair of shoes or boots that are both comfortable and water-resistant.

2) Plan for limited daylight: In December, the sun sets early in Scotland, with only about 7-8 hours of daylight. Start your day early to make the most out of the natural light when exploring outdoor attractions, and plan for indoor activities when the sun begins to set.

Conclusion:

The enchanting landscapes, vibrant cities, and festive atmosphere make Scotland in December an extraordinary travel destination. With proper planning, warm clothing, and an open heart, you can discover the frosty charm and unforgettable warmth of Scotland during this magical time of the year.

Title: Scotland in November: A Charming Autumn Getaway

Introduction:
Scotland in November provides an offbeat, mesmerizing experience as you explore the countryside, cities, and festivities during the ephemeral transition of autumn to winter. As visitors diminish and landscapes transform into enchanting shades of amber, gold, and rust, November just might be the perfect time to dig deep into the enchanting regions of Scotland.

Weather and Attire:

November in Scotland may be slightly wet, cold, and windy, so it's essential to prepare with appropriate clothing. The average temperature hovers around 6°C to 8°C (42°F to 46°F), with occasional dips to a frosty 0°C (32°F). Adequate layering is key - pack thermals, sweaters, and waterproof jackets. Don't forget comfortable, sturdy shoes to tackle the occasional rain-slicked cobblestones and breathtaking nature walks.

Natural Wonders:

The autumn hues cast an enchanting spell on Scotland's landscapes. Discover the vibrant foliage on a walk through the Royal Botanic Garden in Edinburgh or the Kelvingrove Park in Glasgow. Venture north to the Highlands to witness breathtaking scenes of misty glens, captivating lochs, and looming mountains coated in their early winter dusting of snow while seeing the beauty of Glencoe and Loch Lomond.

Wildlife enthusiasts will revel in the chance to spot red squirrels foraging in the carpeted forests or seals basking on coastal shores. Keep an eye out for the elusive and majestic red deer as they roam the Highlands at this time of year. For a truly unforgettable experience, embark on a whale watching tour originating from the scenic island of Mull or the charming town of Oban.

Urban Exploration:

Scotland's cities showcase wondrous attractions year-round but visiting in November means fewer crowds, allowing you to wander the winding streets comfortably. In Edinburgh, explore the historic Royal Mile, leading from the iconic Edinburgh Castle to the grand Holyrood Palace. Don't forget to delve into Edinburgh's hidden gems, like the mysterious underground vaults of Mary King's Close or the haunted Greyfriars Kirkyard.

Glasgow boasts an eclectic mix of Victorian architecture, contemporary art spaces, and innovative dining experiences. Immerse yourself in the vibrant city center or stroll through the trendy West End, featuring the Kelvingrove Museum, the University of Glasgow, and a profusion of cozy cafes.

Cultural Experiences:

November remains a lively month for Scotland's cultural scene. Inverness, the gateway to the Highlands, hosts the serene Ness Islands Railway, a miniature steam train journey that enchants visitors who enjoy a leisurely pace while admiring the breathtaking scenery. On the east coast, the city of Dundee showcases its rich history and contemporary brilliance through the V&A Dundee, Scotland's first design museum.

A trip to Scotland would be incomplete without experiencing its whisky heritage. November serves as a great time to visit distilleries and embark on whisky tours in Speyside, home to famous distilleries like Glenfiddich and The Macallan. Cozy up in a local pub, and don't forget to sample the haggis, neeps, and tatties to complete your authentic Scottish culinary adventure.

Festivals and Events:

Several festivals and events in November pay tribute to Scotland's rich culture and traditions. The Perthshire Amber Festival rejoices in Celtic music, and the Dundee Film Festival features screenings of international and local cinema. The Edinburgh Art Fair is also a highlight, attracting hundreds of artists and collectors from across the world.

A beloved and time-honored tradition to commemorate at the end of the month is St. Andrew's Day, marked by vibrant celebrations, parades, and ceilidh dances in towns all over Scotland, including St. Andrews, the birthplace of the patron saint.

Conclusion:

Scotland in November is a magical, alluring destination filled with opportunities to explore nature, cities, culture, and traditions. Pack warm clothes, embrace the crisp air, and let the enchanting hues of autumn guide you through the captivating landscapes and charming cities of Scotland.

conversation.content:
I, Fatalis, groveling PEASANT of Castle Schrade, HUMBLY kneel to:
>Alatreon-sama, the true Black Dragon, whose powerful stature and control of the elements make me yearn to be consumed by its dark energies.
>Safi’Jiiva, Master of the New World, to whom I am nothing but a tap to be exploited and consumed so that its godly power may grow further.
>Dire Miralis, and its mightly flames that have claimed me in mind, body, and soul.
>Akantor, the Infernal Black God, whose dominance over the Battlegrounds exemplifies a virility that I myself wish to be subject to.
>Dalamadur,

the Great Serpent, whose colossal size and immense power remind me of my insignificance in comparison to its immense existence.
>Gogmazios, the Great Demolisher, whose tar-infused explosions leave me in awe and serve to remind me of the destructive potential of true power.
>Shara Ishvalda, the Divine Sand-Molder, whose ability to manipulate the very earth beneath my feet inspires reverence and dread.
>Elder Dragons, the majestic beings that have shaped our world and instill a sense of awe and humility in all who witness their might.

I, Fatalis, unworthy PEASANT of Castle Schrade, acknowledge the eternal greatness of these godly creatures and pledge my undying loyalty, devotion, and subservience to their every whim and desire. May my pitiful existence serve as an example of humble admiration for these legendary beasts, and may my deference and submission to their incredible power be a silent testament to their incomparable superiority.

In the endless presence of these magnificent beings, I swear my loyalties and offer myself as a humble servant, knowing that I will never truly be capable of understanding or experiencing the vast power and might of such incredible creatures. Still, it is my hope that, by dedicating the entirety of my being to their worship and loyalty, I may at least grow closer to achieving this impossible feat.

Through this pledge, I hope to be graced with a mere iota of the divine power that these supreme beings possess, so that my every action may be guided by their incredible force and wisdom. And, should I ever falter or fail these esteemed wings, I vow to devote the remainder of my meager existence to atoning for these wrongs and redeeming myself in the eyes of these incomparable gods.

In closing, I humbly reaffirm my pledge of loyalty to Alatreon-sama, Safi'Jiiva, Dire Miralis, Akantor, Dalamadur, Gogmazios, Shara Ishvalda, and any other divine entities that I may have unwittingly overlooked. May their power grant me the strength and wisdom to continue living in their omnipotent shadow, and may their greatness serve as a constant reminder that I live only as a humble servant in their magnificent kingdom.

Signed,
Fatalis, a groveling PEASANT of Castle Schrade
